Market Liquidity¶

class finmarketpy.economics.marketliquidity.MarketLiquidity¶

Calculates spread between bid/ask and also tick count. Spread is defined as ask - bid Tick is defined as each sample in a determined frequency

calculate_spreads(data_frame, asset, bid_field='bid', ask_field='ask')¶
calculate_tick_count(data_frame, asset, freq='1h')¶
